actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS (
OID,
CUSTOMER_OID,
CUSTOMER_ID,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE1,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE2,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_CITY,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_DISTRICT,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_ZIP,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_STATE,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,
CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_NO,
CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_EXTEN,
	CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_LINE1,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_LINE2,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_CITY,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_DISTRICT,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_ZIP,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_STATE,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,
CUSTOMER_REG_PHONE_NO,
CUSTOMER_REG_PHONE_EXTEN,CUSTOMER_REG_EMAIL,
	CUSTOMER_COMM_EMAIL,
		CUSTOMER_ISGSTINVOICING_ADDRESS,
	CUSTOMER_ADDRESS_GSTTAXID	
)VALUES
(
{{utils.generateOID(19)}},
{{appsmith.store.customerOID}},		
{{appsmith.store.customerID}},
'E_ADDRESSTYPE_BOTH',
{{appsmith.store.vayCrComAddr1}},
{{appsmith.store.vayCrComAddr2}},
{{appsmith.store.vayCrComCity}},
{{appsmith.store.vayCrComDistrict}},
{{appsmith.store.vayCrComPinCode}},
{{appsmith.store.vayCrComState}},
{{appsmith.store.vayCrComCountry}},
 {{PhoneInputCommNo.value}},
 {{Input2.text}},
 {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegAddrr1}},
 {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegAddrr2}},
 {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegCity}},
 {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegDistrict}},
 {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegPinCode}},
 {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegState}},
 {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegCountry}},
 '',
'',
 '',
 {{InputCommEmail.text}},
 {{SelectAddressforGSTInvoicing.selectedOptionValue}},
 {{InputGSTTAXID.text}}
);
